itemInfo.itemDesc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Rough Black Crystals.

item.name: Rough Black Crystal
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing. Rough Black Crystal requires a certain level of skill to collect.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Gathered near the Mediah Abandoned Iron Mine.

item.name: Grunil Gloves of Iron Wall
item.desc:
Iron Wall energy is contained within these Grunil Gloves.
- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Grunil Gloves of Iron Wall, Grunil Gloves

item.desc:

item.name: Ultimate Grunil Armor
item.desc:
Grunil Armor developed to its maximum potential.
- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Grunil Armor of Iron Wall, Grunil Armor of Agility, Grunil Armor of Intimidation, Grunil Armor

item.name: Ultimate Grunil Helmet
item.desc:
A Grunil Helmet developed to its maximum potential.
- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Grunil Helmet of Iron Wall, Grunil Helmet of Agility, Grunil Helmet of Intimidation, Grunil Helmet

item.name: Grade 3 Armor Reform Stone
item.desc: A material used in 3rd-grade armor upgrade.\n-Obtainable from: Refinery, through crafting.

item.name: Grade 3 Weapon Reform Stone
item.desc: A material used in 3rd-grade weapon upgrade.\n-Obtainable from: Refinery, through crafting.
